channel.title: Quick help please
channel.description: right i just set everything up like on the tutorial. i got my client and source etc. how do other people join?? like do i give them a ip code or something to type in moparscape or what?

item.title: Quick help please
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

Not really sure what you mean…what tutorial did you use?

I will give you a little mini tutorial and you can go through it to make sure you did it.

First go to your command prompt.
start>all programs>accessories>command prompt

When its open type ipconfig

Fine you default gateway and type it in on a web browser(like you would for a site)

Log in to configure your settings…usually the login is like this:
Account: Administrator or admin or nothing
Password: Administrator or admin or nothing

Once you log in(depending on your router or what ever) configure your settings…

Basically your going to find the portforwarding tap if there is one and type in your default gateway and stuff…
Use portforward.com for more help on that.

After that get no-ip.

Setup a host to run on your server.
It should end up being like example.no-ip.biz

When no-ip is running go into your client and depending on your revision you will need to find the .java file containing your connection ip…(could be 127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0 or the previous server name)

Put your no-ip address where the 127.0.0.1 or whatever was…compile it and give it out to users.

If they have an ip changer client then just tell them your no-ip host.

If you still need help post below or pm me lol.

Read full topic
